name: Pirate
description: A scourge of the high seas, you plunder for loot and fame.

exploits.name: Crows nest
exploits.description: You have spent many hours on the lookout. You can always access the ambush turn.

exploits.name: Hook
exploits.description: One of your hands is now a hook. You are always considered to be carrying a knife. You also gain a bonus +1 REP.

exploits.name: Keelhauled
exploits.description: You've been keelhauled or felt the lash of the cat at least once. You gain SOAK 2.

exploits.name: Rigging
exploits.description: You do not suffer penalties for fighting while climbing.

exploits.name: Fearsome reputation
exploits.description: Your reputation precedes you. With a REP vs. MENTAL DEFENSE attack you can intimidate a single target within 30'. If successful, the target becomes Afraid.

exploits.name: Polly
exploits.description: You gain a small bird (crow, parrot, owl, etc.) as an animal companion. See the druid career for information on animal companions.

exploits.name: Fierce reputation
exploits.description: Your reputation is now so fierce that you can either make the target severely Afraid, or all targets within 30' Afraid with a REP vs. MENTAL DEFENSE attack.
